text: Ioan Pap-Deac (born 17 October 1969) is a Romanian professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper. He is currently a goalkeeping coach at Luceafărul Oradea. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:People from Bihor County Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:FC Bihor Oradea players Category:FC Progresul București players Category:FC Olimpia Satu Mare players Category:FC Universitatea Cluj players Category:CS Minaur Baia Mare (football) players Category:ACF Gloria Bistrița players Category:FC Unirea Dej players
title: Ioan Pap-Deac
